summary: A new dungeon and part of a 3-part series delving into another Dwemer secret!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u][b]The Path to Erzvasel - Part 1[/b][/u][/size]

[font=Courier New]- Direbrozel - [/font]

Take part in the tail-end of a months-long expedition, heralded by one of Calcelmo's apprentices, a man named Ancevo. He had theorized that the Dwemer of Skyrim had done their own experiments into the divine - similar to what the ill-fated Dwemer of Morrowind had done - with apparently no success. All the same, it is a matter of academic pride to discover how far they had come to accessing Aetherius.

The first leg of Ancevo's journey was a small Dwemer ruin named Direbrozel, a surface-level ruin near [b]Halldir's Cairn[/b] south of Falkreath. Explore and traverse the ancient ruin and maze to learn of Ancevo's next destination, and learn more of his expedition.

I have been working on this quest mod for some time, but it's become far too large for me to work on at the moment, so I've decided to slim the file down into separate dungeons, and see if it's still well received.
[b]
Installation:[/b]
- One ESP file needing to be placed in the Skyrim Data folder.

[b]Requirements:[/b]
- Skyrim
- Update
- Dragonborn

It's only a small dungeon, but I hope you enjoy this first part all the same!
author: ClefJ
